text: Uye iye (murume) akamutenga kuEgypt akati kumukadzi wake: “Ita kuti agare zvakanaka, dzimwe nguva angatibatsira kana kuti tichamutora semwana.” Uye ndiwo magadziro atakaita Josefa munzvimbo kuti tive tinomudzidzisa zvirevo zvezviitiko. Uye Allah vane masimba ose pahurongwa hwavo, asi vanhu vazhinji havazivi
